1.title: Casey Anthony

episode of.title: Marcia Clark Investigates The First 48 (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: World famous prosecutor, Marcia Clark, investigates the bone chilling, unresolved death of toddler Caylee Anthony. Was this beautiful little girl murdered by her own mother, Casey Anthony

2.title: Drew Peterson

episode of.title: Marcia Clark Investigates The First 48 (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: World famous prosecutor, Marcia Clark, investigates the disappearance of 23-year-old mother of four, Stacy Peterson, who vanished without a trace. As the world searched for her, all eyes began to focus on her cop husband Drew Peterson when it was discovered his previous wife died suspiciously. Is Drew Peterson responsible for both of his wives' deaths? Marcia will dissect the first 48 hours of this case to try to discover exactly what happened to Stacy Peterson.

3.title: Chandra Levy

episode of.title: Marcia Clark Investigates The First 48 (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: World famous prosecutor, Marcia Clark, examines the mysterious death of Chandra Levy

4.title: Robert Blake

episode of.title: Marcia Clark Investigates The First 48 (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: World famous prosecutor Marcia Clark attempts to uncover the truth behind the unsolved murder of actor Robert Blake's wife, Bonnie Lee Bakley.

5.title: The Spreckels Mansion Mystery

episode of.title: Marcia Clark Investigates The First 48 (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: World famous prosecutor, Marcia Clark, dissects the suspicious death of Rebecca Zahau, girlfriend of multi-millionaire pharmaceutical tycoon, Jonah Shaknai. When Rebecca's body was found tied, gagged and hanging naked outside her boyfriend's seaside mansion, law enforcement quickly determined her death was a suicide. Was it a suicide or was it murder? On the hunt for the truth, Marcia combs for clues in the First 48 of this mind-boggling, real-life mystery to determine what happened to Rebecca Zahau.

6.title: Jam Master Jay

episode of.title: Marcia Clark Investigates The First 48 (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: World famous prosecutor, Marcia Clark, dives deep into the world of hip hop to search for the truth of what really happened to legendary DJ, Jam Master Jay. Marcia will navigate the twists and turns of numerous theories that surround the mysterious death of this icon. Was Jay shot because of a dangerous past? Was he killed by someone close to him? Was it a drug deal gone bad? Or was it something else entirely? With no one ever charged with the murder, Marcia will dissect the first 48 hours of the initial investigation, and attempt to get to the truth.

7.title: Billionaire Boys Club

episode of.title: Marcia Clark Investigates The First 48 (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: World famous prosecutor, Marcia Clark, investigates one of the world's most infamous cases: The Billionaire Boys Club. Was the leader of the club, Joe Hunt, so obsessed with money and power that he became a cold blooded killer?

imdb.plot outline: Famed prosecutor and defense attorney Marcia Clark delves into some of the most controversial homicides in America. These are cases that have shocked and captivated the public, but have outcomes that are either unresolved, or leave more questions than answers. Now, Marcia will speak with experts, review the facts, and use her own expertise to shed new light on cases which have been left in the darkness.
